rules.routing: Use app/ or pages/ directory routing (/api, /dashboard, etc.)
rules.api: Use pages/api/*.js or app/api for all backend logic
rules.components: Use /components/ folder for all UI blocks (buttons, cards, popups)
rules.blockchain: Use ethers.js, polkadot.js, wagmi or @moonbeam-network SDKs
rules.wallet_rpc: Setup inside utils/web3/ or services/ folder
rules.backend_extensions: If heavy backend is needed, use Node.js APIs via /api routes
rules.mongodb: Setup with mongoose inside lib/db.js or utils/dbConnect.js
rules.realtime: Use Socket.io in api/socket.js (or Next.js server edge functions)

agents.frontend: Always use Next.js components with Tailwind
agents.backend: Use API inside pages/api/*.js or app/api
agents.blockchain: Integrate Moonbeam, Substrate, Polkadot using Next.js-compatible tools
agents.debugger: Auto-fix code inside app/, api/, or components/
agents.router: Detect which service (GoSellr, Franchise, etc.) is being built and activate correct agent
agents.data: If any file, config, secret, or content is missing â€” ask the user automatically
agents.security: Protect .env keys, validate inputs, use headers securely
agents.testing: Use Jest or Playwright for component/api testing (if required)

final_guideline: Never use Express.js, PHP, Laravel, or any other backend.
Everything must remain inside Next.js architecture only.
module_start_message: Starting {module} on Next.js with Tailwind and /api/{module} backend
